\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* passeth \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \add was\add* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w remaineth|strong="G3306"\w* \add is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.
